# Test for git page

Some random plot ...

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

plot_d <- diamonds %>% 
  group_by(cut) %>% 
  summarise(mean_price = mean(price)) %>% 
  mutate(cut = factor(cut, levels = cut[order(mean_price)]))

plot_d %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = cut, y = mean_price)) +
  geom_col(colour = "black", fill = "dark blue")
```
